documentation.text:
@notice Deactivate a pay-per-query defi client
 @param defi The address of a client (DeFi DApp)

@notice A view function returning the latestPrice
 @param token  The address of the token contract

attributes.text:
@notice Deactivate a pay-per-query defi client
 @param defi The address of a client (DeFi DApp)

@notice A view function returning the latestPrice
 @param token  The address of the token contract

activate(address).details: No contract is allowed to call it

params.defi: The address of a client (DeFi DApp)

params.token: The address of the token contract

params.num: The number of price sheets in the list
params.token: The address of the token contract

returns._0: The array of prices, each of which is (blockNnumber, ethAmount, tokenAmount)

query(address,address).details: Consider that if a user call a DeFi that queries NestQuery, DeFi should     pass the user's wallet address to query() as `payback`.

returns._0: ethAmount The amount of ETH in pair (ETH, TOKEN)
returns._1: tokenAmount The amount of TOKEN in pair (ETH, TOKEN)
returns._2: avgPrice The average of last 50 prices
returns._4: bn The block number when (ETH, TOKEN) takes into effective

params.num: The number of price sheets in the list
params.token: The address of the token contract

returns._0: The array of prices, each of which is (blockNnumber, ethAmount, tokenAmount)

updateAndCheckPriceNow(address).details: The payback address is ZERO, so the changes are kept in this contract         The ABI keeps consist with Nest v3.0

params.tokenAddress: The address of token contract address

returns._0: ethAmount The amount of ETH in price pair (ETH, ERC20)
returns._1: erc20Amount The amount of ERC20 in price pair (ETH, ERC20)
returns._2: blockNum The block.number where the price is being in effect

activate(address).notice: Activate a pay-per-query defi client with NEST tokens

latestPrice(address).notice: A view function returning the latestPrice

priceList(address,uint8).notice: A view function returning the historical price list from the current block

queryPriceList(address,uint8,address).notice: A non-free function for querying price

updateAndCheckPriceNow(address).notice: The main function called by DeFi clients, compatible to Nest Protocol v3.0
